About Chicken Chalet Chicken Chalet is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1139 Front St in Binghamton, NY . Chicken Chalet has been described as an Exceptional Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 7 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Catering Services, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Chicken Chalet
All Reviews for Chicken Chalet
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
7
Decor
7
Service
7
I don't know how the food was we sat there for 90 minutes and all we got was a glass of water. The waitress after 30 min finally took our order when we complained. Finally we just got up and left. if we owe for our 4 glasses of water we got let me know. I'll send it to you. J.P.
Overall Rating
7
"Exceptional"
